synopsis.text:
His life forever changed when a colossal robot attacked his city, high school student Aoba Watase found himself saved by his enigmatic classmate, Hina Yumihara, who piloted her own mecha suit, a Valiancer. Hina, hailing from the future, whisked Aoba 70 years forward in time to prevent his untimely death, thrusting him into a raging war between the Free Treaty Alliance and the Great Zogilia Republic.

Now in the cockpit of his own Valiancer, the Luxon, Aoba teams up with the seasoned pilot Dio Weinberg, forming a successful partnership that allows them to share experiences and enhance their combat abilities. As they navigate the complexities of this futuristic war, Aoba and Dio forge a deep friendship that will shape their destinies and potentially alter the course of the world.

Despite his immediate concerns about returning home, Aoba finds himself entangled in a conflict far greater than himself. As he adapts to his new reality, he must harness his newfound skills and form alliances to protect the world and secure his future. This thrilling tale of friendship, growth, and high-stakes robot warfare will leave you eager to witness Aoba's journey unfold.
